seo: Kubernetes,未授权访问,漏洞检测,指纹识别,Api Server
seo_en: Kubernetes, unauthorized access, vulnerability detection, fingerprint identification, Api Server
summary: 该插件用于检测Kubernetes Api Server是否存在未授权访问漏洞，通过发送特定请求并分析响应来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is an unauthorized access vulnerability in the Kubernetes Api Server, confirming the existence of vulnerabilities by sending specific requests and analyzing responses.
